group_1.textRight: So what's up with the call from the student council?

group_1.textLeft: We've been travelling to and from Kamihama City@a lot lately, haven't we...?
Because of that, I haven't been able to attend@student council meetings very often...
I've been doing the bare minimum as the president.
Not showing up to meetings@is becoming a problem...
As such, the other girls in the student council@wished to speak to me...

group_1.textRight: Even though your schedule's packed,@you've been working as hard as you can.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you, Hikaru...
But none of the other students are aware@of what's been going on.
If I carry on like this,@I'll find myself in a very difficult position.
I've been preoccupied with my duties@as a Magical Girl... I don't know what to tell them.
If this is the result of me failing to show up
for one reason or another...
I'm not sure that I can make excuses any longer...

group_1.textRight: I can't ask you to work any harder than you already@are...
Why don't you ask the student council for help?

group_1.textLeft: For help...?

group_1.textRight: You've been solving everyone's problems up til now,@right?
and got them to share the worries@they hadn't talked about yet.
I think it's your turn now, you know?
Of course, you can't tell 'em about Magical Girl stuff...
But if you go talk to them,@maybe you'll be able to work something out.
...I guess it's kinda naive of me to think like that,@huh...

group_1.textLeft: (Come to think of it...)
(Thus far, all I've done is avoid the student council.)
(I've never once asked anything of them...)
(Perhaps I've become a bit arrogant...)

group_1.textRight: If you keep doing this,@you're gonna have to step down...
I'm ready to take your place, but...

group_1.textLeft: No... Thank you, Hikaru...
You always teach me the most valuable lessons...
Asking for assistance...@Maybe I should give it a try.
